Package com.camerontec.util.logger.hpl.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HighPerformanceLogPlayer
    Defines the interface for all types of HighPerformanceLogPlayers.
    IHighPerformanceLogPlayerListener
    Callback API for clients of the TailingHighPerformanceLogPlayer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleHighPerformanceLogPlayerListener
    High performance log event listener which simply prints events to the console.
    DirectoryLockFile  
    HighPerformanceLogEntryBatch
    Class which represents a log entry batch.
    HighPerformanceLogFileAscendingComparator
    Simple ascending comparator based strictly on log file sequence numbers.
    HighPerformanceLogFileDescendingComparator
    Simple ascending comparator based strictly on log file sequence numbers.
    HighPerformanceLogFileEventParser
    Simple parser which knows how to parse BytesSegment representations of persisted HighPerformanceLogEvents.
    HighPerformanceLogFileNameUtils
    Log file name utilities and constants.
    HighPerformanceLogFileReader
    A reader of high performance log files returning raw log event byte segments.
    HighPerformanceLogFileSystem
    Simple file system like view of the log files in a directory.
    HighPerformanceLogFileSystem.EventLocationDescriptor
    Class used to hand back event location details to callers of HighPerformanceLogFileSystem.findFirstEvent(long).
    HighPerformanceLogFileSystem.LastEventTimestampData
    Container class to hold log event timestamp and timestamp count information.
    HighPerformanceRollingLogFileWriter
    High performance logging subsystem rollover file writer.
    OfflineHighPerformanceLogPlayer
    Class capable of playing HighPerformanceLogEvents from a high performance logger directory.
    TailingHighPerformanceLogPlayer
    Class capable of playing and tailing HighPerformanceLogEvents from a high performance logger directory.
    ViewLogs
    Command-line HPL player.
    YieldingHighPerformanceLogPlayer
    Class capable of playing and tailing HighPerformanceLogEvents from a high performance logger directory.
    YieldingHighPerformanceLogPlayerExecutor
    Runs a set of YieldingHighPerformanceLogPlayer using the provided executor.
    YieldingHighPerformanceLogPlayerExecutorPool
    Runs a set of YieldingHighPerformanceLogPlayerExecutor and distributes log player registrations to them.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConsoleHighPerformanceLogPlayerListener.OutputStyle
    Event output styles
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalEventException
    Exception indicating an illegal event has been encountered.
